string.text:
Ergonomics being a key focus in its design, the Walther P99 is a recoil-operated pistol with a fibreglass polymer frame. Developed for law enforcement and the civilian shooting market, it's employed by police units in a number of countries.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Can be upgraded using Tactical Kit.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: none

Ergonomics being a key focus in its design, the Walther P99 is a recoil-operated pistol with a fibreglass polymer frame. Developed for law enforcement and the civilian shooting market, it's employed by police units in a number of countries.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Threaded barrel for using with suppressor, Tritium sights and Viridian X5L laser sight.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: Gemtech suppressor
%c[ui_gray_1]The kit includes: Threaded barrel for using with suppressor, Tritium sights and Viridian X5L laser sight.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Walther P99 pistol
